mapper.select: SELECT B.CUST_ID, B.NAME AS CUST_NAME, B.NRIC AS CUST_NRIC, B.NATION AS CUST_NATION, C.CODE AS CUST_TYPE FROM SAL0027D A JOIN SAL0029D B ON B.CUST_ID = A.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M C ON C.CODE_ID = B.TYPE_ID WHERE A.STUS_CODE_ID = 9 AND B.STUS_CODE_ID = 1 AND (A.TEL_M1 = #{custPhoneNo} OR A.TEL_M1 = #{custPhoneNoWoutCode}) ORDER BY C.CODE_ID

SELECT S01.SALES_ORD_ID order_id , S01.SALES_ORD_NO order_no , S01.CUST_ADD_ID CUST_ADD_ID , S26.STK_CODE product_code , S26.STK_DESC product_name , S64.AREA area , S13.CODE_NAME APP_TYPE FROM SAL0001D S01 JOIN SAL0002D S02 ON S01.SALES_ORD_ID = S02.SALES_ORD_ID JOIN SAL0029D S29 ON S29.CUST_ID = S01.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0026M S26 ON S02.ITM_STK_ID = S26.STK_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0023D S23 ON S23.CUST_ADD_ID = S01.CUST_ADD_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0064M S64 ON S64.AREA_ID =S23.AREA_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M S13 ON S13.CODE_ID = S01.APP_TYPE_ID AND S13.CODE_MASTER_ID = 10 WHERE S29.CUST_ID = #{custId} AND S29.NRIC = #{custNric} AND S01.STUS_CODE_ID <> 10

SELECT DISTINCT(Extent1.STATE_ID) AS STATE_ID FROM PAY0025D Extent1 INNER JOIN PAY0026D Extent2 ON Extent2.STATE_ID = Extent1.STATE_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0001D Extent3 ON Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO = Extent2.STATE_ITM_ORD_NO WHERE 1=1 AND Extent2.STATE_ITM_ORD_NO = #{orderNo} AND Extent1.STATE_MONTH = #{month} AND Extent1.STATE_YEAR = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')-1 ORDER BY Extent2.STATE_ITM_ORD_NO DESC

SELECT DISTINCT(Filter1.TAXINVOICEID1) AS STATE_ID ,TO_CHAR(Filter1.TAX_INVC_REF_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS INVC_DT FROM ( SELECT Extent1.TAX_INVC_ID TAXINVOICEID1 , Extent1.TAX_INVC_REF_NO TAX_INVC_REF_NO , Extent1.TAX_INVC_REF_DT TAX_INVC_REF_DT , Extent1.TAX_INVC_CUST_NAME TAX_INVC_CUST_NAME , Extent1.TAX_INVC_MONTH TAX_INVC_MONTH , Extent1.TAX_INVC_YEAR TAX_INVC_YEAR , Extent1.TAX_INVC_TYPE TAX_INVC_TYPE , Extent2.INVC_ITM_ORD_NO INVC_ITM_ORD_NO , Extent2.INVC_ITM_RENTAL_FEE INVC_ITM_RENTAL_FEE , Extent2.INVC_ITM_INSTLMT_NO INVC_ITM_INSTLMT_NO , Extent4.CUST_ID TAX_INVC_CUST_ID FROM PAY0029D Extent1 JOIN PAY0030D Extent2 ON Extent1.TAX_INVC_ID = Extent2.TAX_INVC_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0001D Extent4 ON Extent4.SALES_ORD_NO = Extent2.INVC_ITM_ORD_NO WHERE Extent1.TAX_INVC_BILL_TYPE = 133) Filter1 LEFT JOIN PAY0017D Extent3 ON Filter1.TAX_INVC_REF_NO = Extent3.ACC_INV_VOID_INVC_NO WHERE Extent3.ACC_INV_VOID_ID IS NULL AND Filter1.TAX_INVC_TYPE = '1268' AND Filter1.INVC_ITM_ORD_NO = #{orderNo} AND Filter1.TAX_INVC_MONTH = #{month} AND Filter1.TAX_INVC_YEAR = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')-1 and rownum =1
SELECT REQ_ID ,STATE_ID ,STATE_TYPE ,ORDER_NO ,RPT_NAME ,FILE_NAME ,STUS ,STUS_REM ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,RPT_PARAMS FROM CBT0006M WHERE STUS = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MSC0059D ( MAIL_ID, EMAIL_TYPE, EMAIL_SUBJECT, EMAIL_PARAMS, TEMPLATE_NAME, EMAIL, NAME, EMAIL_SENT_STUS, CRT_DT, CRT_BY, CATEGORY_ID, ATTACHMENT ) VALUES ( MSC0059D_MAIL_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{emailType}, #{emailSubject}, #{emailParams}, #{templateName}, #{email}, #{name}, #{emailSentStus}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, #{categoryId}, #{attachment} )
UPDATE CBT0006M SET STUS = #{stusUpdate}, UPD_DT = SYSDATE, UPD_USER_ID = 349 WHERE REQ_ID =#{reqId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.APP_TYPE_ID, C.CODE AS RENT_PAY_MODE_CODE, C.CODE_NAME AS RENT_PAY_MODE_DESC FROM SAL0001D A LEFT JOIN SAL0074D B ON B.SALES_ORD_ID = A.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M C ON C.CODE_ID = B.MODE_ID WHERE A.STUS_CODE_ID <> 8 AND B.SVC_CNTRCT_ID = 0 AND A.SALES_ORD_ID = #{orderId} AND A.SALES_ORD_NO = #{orderNo} FETCH FIRST ROWS ONLY

SELECT T.BANK_DTL_ID , T.CTRL_STUS_ID , T.LAST_PAY_DT , T.BANK_APPV , CASE WHEN T.CTRL_STUS_ID <> 4 THEN '-' ELSE T.CODE_NAME END AS IS_APPROVE_STR FROM ( SELECT T1.BANK_DTL_ID , NVL(T2.CTRL_STUS_ID, 1) CTRL_STUS_ID , TO_CHAR(T2.CRT_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') LAST_PAY_DT , NVL(T1.BANK_APPV, 0) BANK_APPV , NVL(t1.BANK_DTL_APPR_CODE,0) BANK_DTL_APPR_CODE , GBSLCVD.FN_GET_DDT_RMK(T1.BANK_DTL_APPR_CODE,1) CODE_NAME FROM PAY0042D T1 JOIN PAY0041D T2 ON T2.CTRL_ID = T1.BANK_DTL_CTRL_ID AND 8 != T2.CTRL_STUS_ID WHERE T1.SALES_ORD_ID = #{orderId} ) T ORDER BY T.BANK_DTL_ID DESC FETCH FIRST ROWS ONLY

SELECT B.CUST_BILL_PAY_REF_NO1 AS REF1, A.SALES_ORD_NO AS REF2 FROM SAL0001D A JOIN SAL0024D B ON B.CUST_BILL_ID = A.CUST_BILL_ID WHERE A.SALES_ORD_ID = #{orderId} AND A.SALES_ORD_NO = #{orderNo} AND A.APP_TYPE_ID <> 5764
SELECT T1.PRGRS_ID, T2.PRGRS FROM SAL0009D T1 JOIN SAL0010M T2 ON T2.PRGRS_ID = T1.PRGRS_ID WHERE T1.SALES_ORD_ID = #{orderId} ORDER BY T1.LOG_ID DESC FETCH FIRST ROWS ONLY
SELECT APP_TYPE_ID FROM SAL0001D WHERE SALES_ORD_ID = #{orderId} AND SALES_ORD_NO = #{orderNo}

SELECT NVL(TO_CHAR(C.PAY_ITM_REF_DT, 'dd/mm/yyyy'), '-') LAST_PAYMENT_DT, (CASE WHEN A.RENT_AMT < 0 THEN (CASE
WHEN A.RENT_DOC_NO LIKE '%OR%' THEN TO_CHAR(NVL(C.PAY_ITM_AMT, 0), 'FM9999990.00') ELSE TO_CHAR((NVL(A.RENT_AMT, 0) * -1), 'FM9999990.00') END) ELSE '0.00' END) LAST_PAYMENT_AMT FROM PAY0022D A LEFT JOIN PAY0064D B ON B.OR_NO = A.RENT_DOC_NO
LEFT JOIN PAY0065D C ON C.PAY_ID = B.PAY_ID AND C.PAY_ITM_STUS_ID = 1 WHERE TO_CHAR(A.RENT_DT_TM, 'yyyymmdd') >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('01/01/1900', 'dd/mm/yyyy'), 'yyyymmdd') AND A.RENT_SO_ID = #{orderId} AND A.RENT_AMT <> 0 AND C.PAY_ITM_REF_DT IS NOT NULL ORDER BY A.RENT_RUN_ID DESC FETCH FIRST ROWS ONLY
